message: Let's get this started! Accept my generous offer and we can move on to more important things.
Let's be fair.  50/50 split seems like the most logical choice.
You were close with the 50/50 split, but I think I deserve a bit more. Consider this a compromise.
Let's meet in the middle. This is a fair offer, considering the time we've spent negotiating.
You're getting closer to my price, but I'm still not convinced. Meet me here or I'll make you regret it.
I'm willing to compromise, but I won't go any lower.  We need to reach an agreement before the value of the money drops further.
You're running out of time, Bob. This is my final offer. Take it or leave it.
